Two sermons preached before the judges of assize 1. At Reading, on Cant: 7.4, 2. At Abingdon, on Ps. 82.1 : with two other sermons preached at St. Maries on Oxford, 1. On I Cor. 15.10, 2. On Psalm 58.11 / by John Hinckley ... Hinckley, John, 1617?-1695.
[14], 88, [20], 89-292, 22 p.
Printed by Hen. Hall, for Ric. Davis, Oxford : 1657.
Eight p. of advertisement bound at end. Imperfect: print show-through. Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
